name: Cyyyber___
description:
That was a small project to attempt to build a small feature, which is drawing you way, and has an endless obstacle system so u wont ever stop playing it (if ur not bad as i'm), as well as chosing your player color.

The APK for the game is inside the builds folder if you wanna check it in your phone.

I did it to improve my portfolio of hyper casual games.

By downloading it you'll be able to see all the codes and stuffs that i used in the projet.
